content.detailedDescription:
Sighting report:   location: middlesbrough, uk
daate:       26th aug 2002

i d like to report a multiple ufo sighting witnessed by myself,
 my girlfriend and a friend of ours mid-afternoon saturday 26th
 aug 2002. conditions were very bright and clear.

we were all out on our roof garden enjoying the great weather and
 my girlfriend, who was lying on her back sunbathing, suddenly
 pointed straight up and said "whats that up there?" 

at first my friend and i couldnt really see anything obvious and
 this wasnt helped by the brightness of the sky or the fact that
 we didnt know what we were looking for. 
however within a few seconds of scanning the area my partner was
 indicating, we managed to spot what had captured her attention.

it appeared to be a small shiny silvery-white sphere, just
 hanging there above us - it was impossible really to say if they
 were very small or very high, but they were probably at least a
 few thousand feet high.

within a few seconds of spotting this sphere i noticed another
 one, and then another and then more. they were all in the same
 area of the sky and i think there were between 7-9 altogether,
 either just hanging there or moving very slowly.

at first we thought they might be birds but their movement was
 not consistent with this idea, no circling or anything - just
 stationary or drifting very slowly.

as we stood watching them, over a period of 4-5 mins they
 gradually moved into a  v  formation directly above us and
 stayed stationary in this position for several minutes - we
 realised then for sure that they couldnt have been balloons
 either and this was something out of the ordinary. we became
 quite excited at this point and i ran indoors to get my camera
 and our friend dashed of to his car to get his binoculars.

however, by the time we got back the spheres had begun to break
 formation and drift apart. looking through the binoculars didnt
 show any further detail,  but we could definitely see that they
 were solid objects.

i put my 70-210mm telephoto lens on my slr and snapped off a few
 pictures, one at around 70mm showing 3 of the spheres in the
 frame and another at 210mm showing just one. i have enclosed
 scans of the prints. 

upon enlarging the scan of the 210mm zoomed picture a little more
 detail became evident, showing in fact the object is not a
 sphere but more teardrop or shell shaped. it also seems to show
 a small trail or maybe a puff of gas venting  ? 

anyway, as we continued watching they all just moved off very
 slowly in different directions until they were out of sight. i d
 say the total duration of the sighting was approx 10-15 mins.  

unfortunately after later finishing off the roll of film i
 mislaid it and it didnt turn up again until a few weeks ago,
 which is why this report is so overdue.

best regards

- eric

Sighting report:   to whom it may concern,
on saturday, 3/26/05 late afternoon i was engrossed in taking
 shots of the prism i noticed in the sky. there was lots of plane
 pollution that day (some call them chemtrails. whatever they are
 -they are an aggrevation to me as a photographer as it ruins
 good color shots.) i proceeded to snap at the sky on the ride
 home from a local park. i never looked at the photos i took that
 day till the next day, sunday.I also did not notice the
 anomoly/ufo/whatever it is when i took the photos as my mind was
 more focused on the prism. in looking over the shots i have 2
 photos with the most unusual anomoly. i don t believe it is a
 "sunspot" nor anything reflecting from within the vehicle as my
 window was wide open. i d be happy to share these with whomever
 altho i found nothing in the sight that tells me how to share
 digital photos. from what i can tell, i must send the negatives.
 i have no "negatives". i have the originals in my computer. any
 suggestions would be greatly appreciated. our  scientific minds 
 are stumped on this one!!
date taken: 3/26/05
time taken: between 5:13 pm and 5:22pm. the 2 photos that show
 that weird thing were taken at exactly 5:21;19 pm and 5:21:20.
 one second apart. there is a big change in the "anomoly" in one
 second. 
i have a series of shots of the prism that i believe was caused
 by the overhead air traffic.Where the sun was setting there was
 alot of pollution.

sincerely,

kim picard

Sighting report:   as i was driving home from work on wednesday,
 march 9, 2005 approximately 9:30 p.M. i was driving up route 44
 past the old saybrook fish house and noticed that their was a
 bright white light in the sky.  it was a clear night and as i
 continued driving up route 44 along the farmington river it went
 from a bright white light to two lights beaming out of the sky
 and then all of a sudden the lights just disappeared.  

that evening when i arrived home my daughter mentioned that my
 mother had called and said that she had seen something around
 7:30 p.M. that evening for approximately 30 minutes in the west
 sky.  my father was also witness to what they thought was a ufo.
  

the following day i spoke with my mother and told her about my
 incident driving home and at that point she shared with me about
 her incident.  

prior to leaving work that evening i had noticed that the planes
 appeared to be flying lower then usual and thought it was a
 little odd and mentioned this to my business associate.  

as a child, i was abducted and remember clearly my experience
 upto a certain point.  it was an intense experience and have not
 been contacted since of what i m aware of.  i have seen a few
 unusual things in the night skies along my travels since my last
 contact.

Sighting report:   this sighting happenned approx one month ago. i was driving
down the "t" road towards crestone. this road directly faces the sangre de cristo mountains. i saw what appeared to be a single large light hovering over the sangres. this light was larger than anything i ve ever witnessed. it
"split" into 3 lights, one in the middle and one on either side, equal-distant from each other. duration of sighting
was approx 2 minutes. the lights "merged" back into a single point and was gone. none of the lights were observed to be moving away...They just were here now and then gone.

Sighting report:   i was driving north on a main road at around
 2am, there was no one else on the road in sight.  i noticed but
 didn t take note of a round white light in my rear view mirror.
 it didnt move, didnt get bigger or smaller, so i assumed it was
 the moon.  it followed me for about 10-15 minutes.  when i
 finally had to stop at a light, i stretched my neck and looked
 up to see the full moon through my sun roof.  i looked back at
 the rear view mirror instantly and the light was gone.  i dont
 know what it was, but it was not a car or any type of street
 light because it was with me for so long.

Sighting report:   my sighting isn t very dramatic.
i noticed something bright going across the sky on friday, feb
 3rd(?). it was a bright white object, probably bigger than a jet
 but farther away.
the reason why i looked outside in the first place, was because
 there were jets (military aircraft) loud, outside, at
 approxamitely 9:30...10:00 pm. it is a weird time for jets in
 colorado springs! 
so i looked out the window to see them.
at first, i didn t think anything of the round, white object. i
 don t know why! but i followed it from my window for five
 minutes or so. i told my husband to look ouside, but he said i
 was crazy. he wouldn t have been a great witness anyway, since
 he had had a few beers. but i do not drink.
i decided to go outside to further track it--it was moving from
 the west over the mountains, to the southeast, when it stopped
 around the star that i believe is polaris. it did some strange
 manuevers, a weird centricity. there was only one.
it seemed to move foward, then back, circle around polaris,
 especially to the left of the star.
i went back in because it was cold, to get some gloves.
when i went back outside, it was still there. i watched it for
 another five minutes.
the white object was not chased by the jets apparently, because
 they were gone before i had even gone back in for gloves. the
 sky was clear in the south east, but a little whispy in the
 north and north west--typical colorado weather.
there was no noise. but it moved really fast, it seemed, and did
 manuevers like jets and helicopters cannot do! 
i went in for cigarette, and when i came back, it seemed to be
 somehow following polaris, directly in front of it. i could
 still see it, however, when it moved slightly from left to
 right.
i don t follow this stuff (until now) but i happened to have an
 old map of the sky. i m pretty sure it was polaris.
it seemed to zoom away, toward the star. after staring at it, to
 see if it returned, or was just a figment, i noticed that the
 stars blink and twinkle, as do airplanes somewhat. this object
 did not. it remained a constant white glow the whole time.
the little dipper (i m somewhat sure) was above it, and to the
 right. i live on the east side, by powers, near peterson afb.
i watched airplanes after that, to get a better idea of how large
 it was. it was farther away than an airplane. i really cannot
 say just how big it was. 
it really seemed to be just a figment, as i cannot wrap my brain
 around something so strange.
i am 29, a stay-at-home mother, with a bachelors in art. 
i would really be interested in hearing from you, or anyone else
 who may have seen this cool sighting--because i really cannot
 believe that i actually saw something like this! 
my husband says he s going to send me to cedar springs (he s
 joking) because i came back in with the whitest face, i m sure!
 my jaw was almost to my chest!
i m only the teeniest bit more scared at night now--i have always
 figured there were ufo s...

Sighting report:   after last night92s report on 7 news, i felt
 compelled to finally come forward with a ufo sighting i had
 while i was in the marine corps. it was either late 1996 or
 early 1997, my infantry unit was training at the pohakuloa
 training area. my master sergeant, msgt. tuia typically had a
 hard time sleeping and would wake me up around 3-4am to drive
 him around so he could get some extra sleep. 

one night, i was driving with him asleep in the passenger seat.
 since it was a training area, i had to drive with an/pvs-7 night
 vision goggles. on a remote road with no other traffic, i was
 looking at the night=92s sky and that is when i saw the object.
 between mauna kea and mauna loa an object appeared and from left
 to right the object moved at an amazing rate and then stopped,
 hovered and moved again. the movements that followed were
 erratic and darted back and forth across the sky. all of the
 movement took place between the sky visible between the
 mountains and then took off into the sky, out of sight. i could
 draw an approximate path of flight. the movements were very
 exact, i liken it to moving a pointer on a pc. if you move the
 pointer quickly from left to right and then in various
 directions all in straight lines. you would see abrupt stops and
 quick acceleration.

the object size in relation to the stars could best be described
 in the following fashion. if the typical star is about the
 diameter of a pin, this object was much brighter and would have
 been about three pins. night vision goggles typically produce
 light noise. the pixels flash and pop but this object was
 definitely not a standard in the equipment. i was also very
 awake when this happened and in fact was quite bored so this
 took me by surprise.

the exclamation point to this event happened right after it
 happened. after seeing this, i immediately pulled the hummer to
 the side of the road. i reacted so quickly that it woke msgt.
 tuia. i was yelling, =93holy s#!@=94 over and over again and got out
 of my vehicle to look around for the object. msgt. tuia kept
 asking, =93what in the hell is wrong with you?=94  and without
 thinking, i told him that i had just seen a ufo. he told me that
 he saw tons of them when he was in vietnam and to get back in
 the vehicle and drive. i couldn=92t believe that he was so
 nonchalant about the event. he acted like it was old news.
 regardless, i knew what i saw and have never forgotten it.

Sighting report:   i have a tape of 4 ufos i saw from my backyard
 in the spring of 1993.  i m pretty sure it was early spring,
 because the trees in my backyard are also in the film, and they
 have buds on them but are not fully leafed out.  it was in the
 early afternoon, possibly 3:00 to 4:00 p.M.  i just happened to
 have my camera handy (camcorder) because i had been filming my
 son earlier that day.  at first i thought they were helicopters,
 but i have never seen helicopters move like this, and also they
 were close enough that, since there were 4 of them, i should
 have been able to hear something, but i couldn t hear anything. 
 one of them had two perfectly round bright lights in the front,
 like headlights.  the other 3 were just single, round bright
 lights.  they flew back and fourth several times, then hovered,
 and then 2 of them crossed over each other.  then they were just
 gone.  i tried to keep them together in frame as much as
 possible, but a few times, they got so far apart from each
 other, it was hard to do that, but i got pretty good shots of at
 least 3 of the 4.  it s not a very long piece, maybe 3 to 5
 minutes.  i would be happy to share it with you.  let me know if
 you are interested.
thank you.

Sighting report:   my sighting was 27 years ago, and i did not
 report it to anyone at the time. i have decided to report it to
 this agency. on march 17th, 1978 at approximately 7:30pm in
 denver, colorado, my husband and i observed several ufo s.
 initially, i was inside with my youngest child, my husband was
 outside with our 3 year son. we had been moving into our new
 home. my husband was reaching down into the cab of our truck to
 retrieve a box when he said it lit up like someone had turned 
 large flashlight on. when he turned around, he saw a circular
 saucer right above tree level almost directly above him. he said
 it had square "ice cube" type lights circling around it, but no
 sound. he immediately ran inside and got me. when we both went
 outside, the ufo had moved to the southern sky, and was now a
 bright light about the size of a dime in the sky. no more than
 20 seconds could have passed between him running into the house
 to get me and us getting outside. as we watched the object, it
 appeared to change shape, but i suspect this was because it was
 also changing colors, going from white to light blue, to orange
 and back. something appeared to drop off of the ufo and trail to
 the ground. it was reddish in appearance. during all of this, i
 had jumped on top of the cab of the truck. while watching this
 ufo, i sensed something above and looked up to see another ufo
 directly overhead. it was much higher than tree level, but low
 enough to appear massive, about the size of a battleship. it
 blocked the lights from the sky, so i could easily make out its
 shape, which was like a diamond. it had three large amber lights
 (shaped in triangular formation) on the bottom. it was moving
 along at a fair rate of speed, but i heard no sound from it. it
 continued to coast along going towards boulder, colorado. i
 watched it till i could no longer see it. the other ufo we had
 initially seen also took off towards boulder, colorado at a very
 rapid speed. it hung over the area of boulder for about a
 minute, then shot straight up and disappeared. we were not the
 only people to see this. neighbors of ours had just arrived home
 and also witnessed this. about 10 minutes after these sightings
 we heard helicopters and jets around our area. i could not say
 if these were military, but it was unusualfor the area. we lived
 off santa fe in denver, which is a very conjested area, not
 rural. thank you, kate charon

Sighting report:   this has been a long time, but i feel i need
 to share this,, as this really happened, and this is real. 190
 description: it was,, i believe, the summer of 1973,, my brother
 and i,, were born in california, my brother was born in 1959,,,
 i was born in 1060. we were told by our father, who was in to
 air force,, to look up to the sky,, when we were just little
 kids,, so we did,, and my dad, knowing about satalites, and
 falling stars, pointed these things out to us boys,, and we were
 fastenated by looking up to the night sky,, and identifying
 these objects, ,, he then worked for howard hughes aircraft,
 then locheed, then martin marieta, worked on the 2nd spacecraft
 that went to mars,, the vicking 2, my father went on to i.B.M,
 and finally retired from i.B.M. it was my fathers having us boys
 looking up into the night sky that led me to the sighting, that
 i wish i did nt ever see,, myself and my brother studyed the
 night sky during the early 1970 s colorado sky,,and we saw a lot
 of things we had never seen before, even though we had stuydied
 the skys back in california, and even out in the desert. but
 here in the mountains of colorado, we began seeing all sorts of
 things,, much more than the usual narural things like falling
 stars, and things like satalites, were much more obvious than in
 the city, but i remember this very clearly, i was waching a very
 distant,, dim pin point type of light,, moving across the sky,
 at a very slow, steady speed, and i said to my brother," there s
 another satalite" i am not sure if my brother ever even found
 this one,, it was allways very hard,, because of the vastness of
 the sky,, for either one of us to be able to find what each
 other were looking at,, sometimes, we would find the moving
 object that the other was looking at, sometimes,, not. this was
 the 1st one i saw,, that blew me away.. it was just a very
 distant piont of light, i mean, way up there, i thought it was a
 satalight, but it just changed direction, sharply,, like off
 maybe 40 degrees, no speed change, it was way ,, i mean way up
 there, moving very slowly across the sky,, just like a regular
 satalite,, but it made a instant,, 40, maybe 45 degree change in
 direction,, satalites do not do this,, i know,, because my
 father told us this is not possible, and i have never seen this
 before. my brother both witnessed this, and we knew ,, and have
 been waching the sky for years,, we made it a hobby, because of
 dad, this object made a sharp course redirection, it was like
 looking a line on a drafting board. its going this, way,,,
 then,, all of the sudden,, sharp angle, instantanious re
 direction off on some angle,, this did not scare me, i just
 couldny make any sense out of it. in that same year, i witnessed
 the scaryiest thing i have ever seen in life. i do not ever want
 to see anything like ever again. 1 was, i believe, about 13
 years old, at that time. my father was driving us up hwy 119,
 between golden colorado,. and the little town of blackhawk
 colorado,,,it was very late, after midnight,, my father was
 driving the "71" duster that he had at the time, my mom was in
 the passenger seat,, i was in the back seat,, on the right
 side,,and my brother was on the left side of me,, in the back
 seat. it was late,, we had visited some friends of my parents in
 denver,, and we were driving back up through the canyon, up hwy
 119, and there are very steep mountains on each side,, and as a
 sky watcher, i was watching,, whenever i could see,, and this
 night, there was clear sky s ,, and as we turned a corner,,
 almost all the way home to blackhawk, a very large,, about the
 size of the moon, ball of light caught my eye, out of the left
 corner of my eye,, at first,, because it was so large,, and
 seemingly regular,, i thought it was the moon, but, it moved!
 and i looked at it,,, and it was not the moon!! it was some sort
 of gasious ball of light,, it overall was,, like i said,, if you
 just saw it out of the corner of your eye,, and didnt actually
 look right at it,, you would have easily have mistaken it for
 the moon. but i caught something moving within it,, so that is
 when i looked right at it,, it was not the moon, it was moving,,
 up,, then down,, then up,, then down a little farther, then up,,
 the drop a little farther, slowly desending,, behind the
 mountain top,, i got a very good look at it,, it had a " erie,
 gasious, moving center, it had a brighter outer ring, around it,
 it was solid,, you really had to look at it to disginguish these
 features. again,, i thought it was the moon,, once i noticed it
 was moving,i knew it was not. i yelled to my dad,, my mother,,
 and my brother,, " look mom,, look,, !!! because it was
 decending behind the mountain,, my mom saw it,, she said to my
 dad,,bill. there s something up there! my father was driving,,
 and we were winding up the canyon,, he did not see it. this is
 not some sort of flying saucer,,, this was some sort of gasious
 ball of light,, some sort of natural,, or maybe made man thing,,
 i once saw a program that said that the rocky mountain arsinal
 pumped a bouch of mustard gass, and all sorts of chemical waste
 into the ground, and the gasses from this are now comming up
 through the old mine shafts in the blackhawk,, central city
 area, as this area is litteraly is like swiss chese with these
 old mine shafts. i do not believe this theory,, my brother and i
 stuyded the skys after this,, although we were scared to even
 look at the sky for a long time. but we have never seen anything
 else since.

 i once saw a program that said that the rocky mountain arsinal
 pumped a bouch of mustard gass, and all sorts of chemical waste
 into the ground, and the gasses from this are now comming up
 through the old mine shafts in the blackhawk,, central city

 old mine shafts. i do not believe this theory,, my brother and i

Sighting report:   driving down from idyllwild on hwy 74 at approx 6:10 pm
observed a triangular object falling east of hwy 74, south of lake hemet and
north of the fire station.  object was a bright neon green, outlined in
yellow, large bright fire extending from the end...It fell into garner
valley...I did not observe any fire or smoke....My 8 year old son in the
back seat also saw the object.....

Sighting report:   march 17 2005...Thursday...Early morning at
 2:00 am pst...Clear sky...Temp-2degree celcius...Star lit sky
 with crescent moon...Moon last observed midnight...12:00pm pst
 march 16/05...Awoke at 2:00 am pst...March 17 2005 with bright
 crecent moon shining in window...Window faces towards az
 320...Ie aprox n40w...First thought..."what a bright crescent
 moon"...Whole room is lit up and i can see most everything in
 the room as if some search light is being used to shine through
 the window...Window is 5 by 6 feet...I am groggy...Turn on
 light...I get up go to the washroom...Come back to the room look
 at watch... 2:00 am...Turn off light to room...And...Crescent
 moon light is gone...Go to window and look out into sky and no
 moon to be seen...Dog in hallway is sound asleep...Motion sensor
 light comes on at back of house 2:20am pst march 17
 2005...Nothing else happens...A moon disapears in less than 1.5
 minutes seems not possible...Will be up watching moon to see
 exact time/position/and movement of moon...Late evening to early
 morning march 18 2005...Time of this posting is 10:45am pst
 march17,2005...

Sighting report:   on march the 26th,1130am,it was a partly
 cloudy day. as my wife and daughter where in the wal-mart
 store,in the mall of orange, i sat out side to wait for them. i
 was looking as to how blue and how clear the clouds looked. then
 from the anaheim hills area or from an easterly direction i
 could see a shiny round object coming in west,it was metalic and
 made no noise,i could not see if it had lights becuse it was far
 and very shiney. it keept moving west till i could no longer see
 it.I saw it for about 5 minutes.

Sighting report:   it was tuesday night on march 15th at
 approx.11pm.I was walking towards my house a couple of blocks
 away and i stopped for the light.While waiting,a bright
 orange-reddish light appeared out of nowhere.It was just to my
 right and didn t appear that high,so i thought that it was a
 transformer going out.It was a clear sky and no rain,so i know
 it wasn t lighting?I stood there for a moment waiting to see if
 there were more,but nothing.It reminded me of the fireworks on
 the forth of july.I thought..Ok,thats kind of strange?I was
 almost home,actually,it was around the corner,when another light
 appeared in the sky.It caught my eye,just to the left.Again,it
 appeared out of nowhere.This time it was green,only it wasn t
 round,but more like a flair,or like a firework that is shot in
 the sky and slowly disapates.So i started looking to see if
 someone had a flair gun and was shooting it off,or maybe they
 were making a movie?(it s common in my area)but no such
 luck.Again i just stood there waiting for something alse,but
 nothing.I just want to say that the lights didn t appear to be
 really high (and this may sound strange)but appeared to be far
 away,even though close by..As if being projected,or brought into
 view,as if in a different dimension and zapped into ours.This is
 the best i can describe it.

i ve never reported anything before.This is my first time seeing
 and reporting.I just had to tell someone and you guys were my
 best bet.
content.summary: Bright orange-reddish light, also a green second one

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting report:   i have tapes of unidentified craft hovering
 over the eastern livermore valley area in california that need
 to be seen by someone other than the few friends i have shown.
 (who have all recommended that i have these tapes seen by
 professionals who know what they are looking at.)it is due to
 the serious statements made by my friends who have seen these
 tapes that have made me finally come forward with them. i am
 asking that someone please contact me asap. this is no hoax or
 prank, and i believe that i have seen something i was not
 supposed to have witnessed, let alone tape with my camcorder.
 thank you for your time.

Sighting report:   april 2, 2005
21:15 hours
triangular aircraft 
partly cloudy sky with a cloud system moving in from the north. 

outside temperature estimated at 60 degrees. 

i exited my vehicle noticing a standout magnitude star at
 approximately 21:13 hours. suddenly, an object moving from the
 south or over my right shoulder came into my field of vision
 moving across my left shoulder. the vehicle was moving at a
 substantial velocity unlike regular air traffic over san luis
 obispo. additionally, orange and white lights tipped this
 unusually shaped craft and did not strobe - it was triangular in
 shape flying at an estimated altitude between 3,000 and 5,000
 feet moving south to north across downtown. furthermore, this
 craft was silent and flying toward the weather system moving in
 from the north.

unidentified flying event duration was approximately 4 minutes in
 length. i did not capture the craft on film or video instead
 drawing my best approximation of the vehicle. please note that
 san luis obispo is an estimated 55 miles from vandenberg air
 force base. 

sincerely,
-scot

Sighting report:   me and my family were driving in the hills  and i was looking out the wind when out in the horizan i saw  a shining light we stoped the car then a oval shaped object flew in to the sky  it then felw right over us  then disappered

Sighting report:
eureka springs, arkansas 72632-9446, two miles east of the city limits, 
carroll county, arkansas
weather: ceiling unlimited.  calm 0-5 mph. out of west.  very clear.

trajectory: from 320 to 290 degrees, magnetic north not considered. =20

i stepped outside to be with our dogs.  the object, bright red, suddenly =
appeared, larger than the usual meteorite, streamed a brilliant red as =
it seemed to angle downward in a straight line, nw to sw.  when it =
reached the approximate 310 degree location it swerved from a straight =
line, moving in same direction but in a slow erratic fashion, then =
burning out at about the 290 degree location.  the trajectory for the =
last 10 or so degrees was curved, lazy, first to the right and then to =
the left and a smaller curve to the right and then staight ahead and =
burned itself out.  my written observations may be off as to the number =
of times it curved. no noise.  no odor. =20

observer s estimate:  my guess is that it was space junk burning up.  =
very impressive.  perhaps others saw it, too, and then a more accurate =
evaluation can be determined.  my wife saw a bright meteroite moving =
from ene to wsw a few evenings before.

we live on a ridge top and our visibility is superior.

                                                                richard =

Sighting report:   it was when i was going on a bike ride to=
 "cerro de la gloria" ("c.G.") about 3 months ago we were two.=
 that place is usually visited often by tourist or even locals.=
 my friend went to take some sun, and i went to watch the=
 monument at the top of "c.G." (arround 6:30pm). on top there=
 were some "condores" (or condors, i don=b4t know the international=
 translation for this kind of bird). well they were flying=
 arround the light posts for the monument (they have a side place=
 for the birds to stay).  

then all of the sudden i notice a tiny white ligh-dot going too=
 fast in the sky... too fast for a jet or advanced plane and with=
 no tail or friction for a small meteorite... also it was at too=
 high altitude. and maintaning a constant speed, i can=b4t tell for=
 sure, but i think it was heading toward the "cordillera de los=
 andes"... i checked other people to catch if they saw that, but=
 everyone were watching the monument... i was really impressed=
 and didn=b4t told anything to my friend until a week.

high altitude, constant speed, no trails, no lower shadow, just a=
 white light spot at a very high speed.

what do you think about it.

many thanks in advance for your answers.

Sighting report:   on sat. march 15 11:30 pm i spotted an object=
 appox. 100 to 150 long moving silently above the trees, then=
 breifly going into the trees before again gaining altitude and=
 moving out of sight. it had lights around the perimeter and was=
 slowly rotating counter clockwise. i was observing this from=
 about 350 yds.

Heard what i thought was the aeromed helicopter across the lake from my office, opened the door and saw it.  it wasn't the aeromed, just a huge helicopter.  grabbed the camera and snapped a picture, watched the blinking light so i could take a second picture before it got out of view, and they were there underneath it.  i wasn't sure if it was spots on my glasses, or something real.  but the sun was glaring off them.  and they showed up in the picture.  they came in from the southeast, almost directly at me.  then they were gone, not slow acceleration, just zero to gone in a split second, if there was noise it was covered by the helicopter noise.
content.summary: Looked like they flew in to see the helicoper, then left.

content.detailedDescription:
At 11pm last night, i had to take my dog outside. while we were walking around my apt complex, i looked up in the sky for i do like to do a little star gazing when i am out that late.  but what i saw wasnt any star at all.
as i looked oover towards the mountains, that are so prevelent here, and are close to the ft hucachuca military base, i noticed some green, red and blue lights traveling around in no particular order.  i thought that maybe it was a plane coming in for landing at the military base, but it wasnt doing such a thing. i guess the best way that i could descrbie it is like a ball of fire but with different colors, and the colors were changing constantly from red, green, blue .  
it kind of shocked me, cuz it was something that i have never seeen before, so i just stood there watching these obljects. i wanted to go around the apt bld and get my camera but i was just frozen there just watching it.
one of the color balls, headed towards me, and as it came closer, it was high in the sky, but there was no noise and it was traveling at a very low speed. at one point i thought and felt like i could just reach out and touch it, but it was a little high up. around this time, it was above me, but was around tree height.  my dog was starting to growl but she didnt bark. she was just as stunned as i was.  i saw this colored ball stop, and then it turned around slowly and headed back to where the others were and then they just shot up in the air.
i didnt feel scared, just kind of trying to believe what i was seeing.   i have heard rumors around town, that there are some really strange aircraft flying into the base at night, and things that one doesnt want to see.
so i am really not too what i saw, but i know that i have never seen anything like it.
i am a little startled now that i have thought about it, and i dont want people to think i am off my rocker, but i know what i saw.
when i came back in the house, i just kind of sat down in my chair, trying to make sense of the sighting.  it did take me a while to calm down, and go to bed. but now that i think about it, my dog growled for a long time after that, and she was staying right near me, the whole night. 
this morning, when i went ot take her outside both her and i were a little hestiate cuz i really wasnt sure if it was still out there or not. but it wasnt.
content.summary: Thre were some bright lights up in the sky around 11pm at night.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my pool swimming, with my brother. my bro told me to look, so i did and saw a cylindrical object with a black line in middle. when i first glimpsed at it i thought it was an airplane, but then i saw the shape of it. it was cylindrical with a black line in the middle. it went north in the east sky. i was amazed and i just kept looking at it. i lost it when it went behind a tree and it never came back in sight
content.summary: Ufo in eastern sky, cylindrical w/ black line in middle

content.detailedDescription: Just finished eating dinner, i stepped outside of my mother-in-laws house to have a cigarette, and view the comets position.The sky beneath the comet had a beautiful cumulus cloud formation. i was admiring the cloud and the incredible colors that were around it in the sky.It was stunning1 just then, about five gold discs appeared from the left of the cloud! they were flying in an almost straight formation passing in front of the cloud! what was more amazing was how the object on the left changed position as they circled around the cloud, almost as if he did not want to enter it as the circled! they were close enough to the cloud, if he had not maneuvered to the right, by dropping below the others then positioning on the right wing,it would have entered the cloud! i told everyone in the house what i saw, they did not know what to make of it. i have never seen a ufo, this was my first!I wish i had a amera!
content.summary: At dusk, while looking at the comet that was visible for days,i saw several gold discs flying in formation after a thunderstorm!

content.detailedDescription: My wife was driving we were coming home from a night at little six casino. it was around 3 am in the morning. we were driving my wife that is, going north on highway 169 we were at anderson lake on 169 south of 494. she said look to the right out are car window about 4 blocks away were 9 white triangle and they were in a triangle shape. we were still driving for  about 10 second and  then they all disappear. for years we talk about that night. but in the last few years i read about what was seen in the area  back in 1997
content.summary: A group of 9 triangle shape white light all in a trriangle

content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other

content.detailedDescription:
1. me and 5 friends were standing on my roof, downtown northfield, having a smoke and talking.

2. i noticed a flashing light coming over the buildings to my southeast, approaching heading northwest.

3. i thought the object was an airplane when i first noticed it, and for a while after first seeing it i thought it was still an airplane.

4. the object had a bright flashing white light,which made me think it was an airplane, but it flew directly over our heads, lower than the clouds, (they were about 6,000 feet base, i am a skywarn spotter for the national weather service, so it had to be lower than 6,000 ft.) we couldn't see the white light as it passed over our heads, but there were 3 red lights and the sky was clear over our head, and you could make out the triangle against the setting suns sky. then as it traveled nw from the back it was flashing red lights from the rear, 3 of them, it sort of looked like break lights of a car. but the object was completely silent, no noise at all, and for how low it was, we should have heard it.
5. my reaction as it passed overhead and i realized it was not a plane, i got really excited. my action was to just watch it float into the setting suns sky.
6. we watched it till we could no longer see it.
content.summary: Black triangle with lights, silent, low, with many witnesses

content.detailedDescription: It happened when im was sleeping i had woke up and there it was hovering silently outside my window .I thought it was a plane but it didnt have the red light like most planes do.It just hovered then it moved and got out of my view very fast.When i saw it i just freaked out.It literally changed my life.
content.summary: It was about 400 ft long black and had lighted windows

content.detailedDescription:
I had walked over to cumberland farms on north main street here in concord for a few packs of smokes . my recept is time stamped 2:45:28 am . the cashier and i spoke for a few minutes about gemstones , here son had given her a nice ring with an oval cabuchon of cherry amber , i'm a collector . i started walking home via chapel street . 

i had gotten to the top of the rise , near the intersection of north state street , when something caught my attention . i suddenly noticed that a star was not a star . it hovered silently and was too low on the horizon , at about the height of a regular jetliner . it strobed red and green , then blue , red and green , then blue repeatedly , it seemed to be a repetitive pattern . it hovered . jetliners do not have blue strobes and do not hover and do generate quite a bit of noise . 

then it headed south , i was not aware of any noise . it came to a stop , hovered briefly , performed a very tight "u-turn" and returned to its' original position north by north west over the northern end of concord .

it seemed much larger than a jetliner as it continued to hover at its' original position . it seemed to be circular in shape with a domed or curved top and bottom . it had no wings , no tail assembly , nothing one would associate with aircraft .

i arrived back home at 3:06 am and it was still hovering in its' original position . i tried to call "the concord monitor" newsroom , there was no one at that hour , however , i did leave a message .

i then remembered that i had to take out the trash ; it was still there hovering in its' original position strobing red and green then blue . 

i still heard no noise , yet i could hear the traffic on the interstate which is down the hill . usually one ignores that constant drone of trucks and vehicles , one just automatically tunes them out , that's most probably a trick one learns subconsciously , that traffic noise was noticeable as i was probably listening for noise from that ufo and it generated no noise .    

i am aware that a number of years ago there were a number of "sightings" here in new hampshire , i was not aware that these were continuing .

i really don't know how i feel about this . at the moment i realised that this was an ufo , i did feel a certain sense of excitement , one of those rare "eureka !!" moments . but , quite frankly , reports of this nature are rather commonplace and my "sighting" and $ 1.50 will still get me a cup of coffee . i don't mean to sound blassee , but i am still the exact same person i was when i left to pick up some packs of smokes . 

i will report this to bass & gregg's offices tomorrow , not that there is anything they can do about an ufo that has probably returned to its' place of origin . i can't for the life of me imagine why they would be interested on the crazy people on this planet in the first place . really , given a choice , there must be must nicer vacation spots in the cosmos !!!!!

yours truly,
brian napier 

ps ..... i have no idea what county this is . concord, is the state capitol . manchester is in hillsborough county and nashua is in merrimack county . this might be merrimack county as well but i doubt it !!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It hovered north north west w/ red, green & blue lights at height of jetliner

content.detailedDescription: I am not sure of the date or the exact time. this occurred while i was working in chiefland, fla. as a reporter. it was my habit to walk late at night in the school yard for exercise. often i walked until well after midnight. i saw this same formation of interstellar objects twice a year apart, going in opposite directions each time, but across the same stretch of space. on both occasions, it was bitterly cold and the night sky was perfectly clear. no clouds or moisture in the air. i could see far into space. i was also in the habit of watching the stars, just for enjoyment. on both cccasions, i saw a formation of white dots, almost identical to the size and shape of stars, moving rapidly through the star field. this group of objects was not in our atmosphere. it, or they, moved from one side of the horizon to the other side in less than two seconds. the formation of starships, as i call them, seemed to "float" or "skip" from side to side ever so slightly. it was the same formation a year later. the first time the formation was headed from the south-southeast to the north-northwest. it was headed south-southeast from the north-northwest the following year. there is absolutely no doubt what i saw. i have never seen a "flying saucer" in the earth's atmosphere. i had begun to think they were someone's imagination. not until i saw these interstellar vehicles did i realize the possibility of ufo's might actually be real. i told my story to a number of friends. they listened as though i was talking in a foreign language. they politely said...Okay and changed subjects. i covered stanton friedman while a college newspaperreporter, probably in 1971 or 1972. mr. friedman spoke at the university of wisconsin stevens point. he probably won't remember me. in any case, i haven't said anything about the two sightings publicly and very little privately for fear of being called a nut. given the reception i received when i mentioned it to friends, i felt it was best to keep a secret. the sightings probably occurred in the late  1980's or early 1990's. i felt i was quite fortunate to see this. i now laugh when i hear people debunk ufo's. i now know, without any doubt, that a much more advanced civilization exists somewhere in the universe, a civililzation capable of the same type of interstellar travel we saw in the fictional star trek series.
content.summary: Out walking-saw group of objections flying in cross formaton through the stars
